rooms.description: A spacious entrance with Art Deco motifs, reception desk, elegant lighting, marble flooring, and Vastu aligned entrance to ensure positive energy flow.

Large open living space with high ceilings, integrated art deco design elements such as geometric patterns, decorative moldings, and a central chandelier. The room features large windows for natural light ensuring balanced sunlight per Vastu principles.
A formal dining area adjacent to the living room, designed with elegant furniture pieces and Art Deco accents, maintaining an airy ambiance aligned with local design norms.
An exclusive lounge area featuring modern entertainment systems integrated within Art Deco styling. This zone includes a seating arrangement for relaxation and social gatherings.
A dedicated home office with soundproof walls, ergonomic furniture, ample lighting, and art deco detailing that fosters productivity while following Vastu guidelines for workspace energy.

Luxury master bedroom suite featuring king-sized bed, en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and Art Deco inspired decor. The room is aligned for optimal sleep quality following Vastu principles with the headboard facing north.
Two additional bedrooms designed to provide comfortable accommodation with individualized lighting and ventilation as per local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
Modern bathrooms integrated in each bedroom suite, featuring elegant fixtures and moisture control measures. Each bathroom is aligned with Vastu principles ensuring proper water flow.
